item.title: 【From Zero to Scale With AWS Serverless】从零到AWS无服务器
item.description:
【

In recent years, cloud-native applications have become the go-to standard for many businesses to build scalable applications. Among the many advancements in cloud technologies, serverless architectures stand out as a transformative approach. Ease-of-use and efficiency are the two most desirable properties for modern application development, and serverless architectures offer these. This has made serverless the game changer for both the cloud providers and the consumers.

For companies that are looking to build applications with this approach, major cloud providers offer several serverless solutions. In this article, we will explore the features, benefits, and challenges of this architecture, along with use cases. In this article, I used AWS as an example to explore the concepts, but the same concepts are applicable across all major cloud providers.

】

近年来，云本地应用程序已成为许多企业构建可扩展应用程序的首选标准。在云技术的许多进步中，无服务器体系结构是一种变革性的方法。易用性和效率是现代应用程序开发的两个最理想的属性，而无服务器体系结构为这些提供了这些属性。这使云提供商和消费者的游戏改变者都无服务器。

对于希望通过这种方法构建应用程序的公司，主要的云提供商提供了多种无服务器解决方案。在本文中，我们将探讨此架构的功能，好处和挑战用例。在本文中，我以AWS为例探索了这些概念，但是相同的概念适用于所有主要的云提供商。

item.title: 【SQL as the Backbone of Big Data and AI Powerhouses】SQL作为大数据和人工智能的骨干
item.description:
【

The term "big data" often conjures images of massive unstructured datasets, real-time streams, and machine learning algorithms. Amid this buzz, some may question whether SQL, the language of traditional relational databases, still holds its ground. Spoiler alert: SQL is not only relevant but is a cornerstone of modern data warehousing, big data platforms, and AI-driven insights.

This article explores how SQL, far from being a relic, remains the backbone of big data and AI ecosystems, thriving in the context of data warehousing and cloud-native technologies like Google BigQuery.

】

术语“大数据”通常会想到大量非结构化数据集，实时流和机器学习算法的图像。在这种嗡嗡声中，有些人可能会质疑SQL（传统关系数据库的语言）是否仍然持有基础。扰流板警报：SQL不仅相关，而且是现代数据仓库，大数据平台和AI驱动的见解的基石。

本文探讨了SQL远非遗物，还是大数据和AI生态系统的骨干，在数据仓库和云本地技术的背景下蓬勃发展，例如 Google bigquery 。

item.title: 【System Design of an Audio Streaming Service】音频流服务的系统设计
item.description:
【

The system design of an audio streaming app is unique in how it deals with idiosyncratic business needs. Typically, audio streaming requires a large amount of data to be transferred within the limited bandwidth of the network communication channel. 

A successful audio streaming service must handle millions of active users and thousands of content providers from various geographical locations. Different devices and platforms (smartphone, desktop, smart speaker) may support different audio formats such as MP3, FLAC, ALAC, and so on. 

】

音频流应用程序的系统设计在处理特质业务需求方面是独一无二的。通常，音频流需要大量数据在网络通信渠道的有限带宽中传输。 

成功的音频流服务必须处理来自各个地理位置的数百万活跃用户和成千上万的内容提供商。不同的设备和平台（智能手机，桌面，智能扬声器）可能支持不同的音频格式，Flac，Alac等。

item.title: 【Secrets Security Is the Most Important Issue For Mobile Apps】秘密安全是移动应用程序最重要的问题
item.description:
【

Recently, the Open Worldwide Application Security Project (OWASP) updated its Top 10 Risks for Mobile Applications for the first time since 2016. The security risk at the top this time? "Improper credential usage."

This is a wake-up call to mobile app providers about the danger of hardcoded credentials and bad secrets hygiene in general.

】

最近，自2016年以来，全球开放式应用程序安全项目（OWASP）首次更新了其移动应用程序的十大风险。这次的安全风险是最高的？ “ 凭证使用不当。”

这是向移动应用程序提供商呼唤的关于硬编码证书和坏秘密卫生危险的呼吁。

item.title: 【OpenCV Integration With Live 360 Video for Robotics】OPENCV与Live 360​​视频机器人集成
item.description:
【

As artificial intelligence gets more advanced, robots are increasingly used to free humans from the risks of inspecting dangerous locations or the drudgery of routine visual surveillance. To provide some degree of autonomous decision, the robot often has cameras connected to an onboard Linux computer such as an NVIDIA Jetson or x86 single-board computer (SBC).

If the application benefits from live 360-degree video, there are two approaches. The first, more difficult approach is to use multiple cameras and stitch the video together on the computer or process each video feed separately. The number of cameras used depends on the field of view of each camera. If the robot uses two fisheye lenses that can show more than 180 degrees, only two cameras are needed. It's common to use three or four cameras.

】

随着人工智能变得更加先进，机器人越来越多地用来使人类摆脱检查危险位置或常规视觉监视的繁琐的风险。为了提供一定程度的自主决定，机器人通常将相机连接到板上Linux计算机，例如NVIDIA JETSON或X86单板计算机（SBC）。

如果该应用程序受益于实时360度视频，则有两种方法。首先，更困难的方法是使用多个摄像头并将视频拼接在一起，或分别处理每个视频供稿。所使用的相机数量取决于每个相机的视场。如果机器人使用两个可以显示超过180度的鱼眼镜头，则只需要两个摄像头。使用三到四个摄像机是常见的。
